twitch_info.title: Highlight: Playing Secret Santa Games (feat. GAMBLING)

message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be the Guy: Playing Secret Santa Games (feat. GAMBLING)

for me it's like, always have a backup plan - for example, last year's game I've made was put together in a couple days or so
actually, they got banned on their main account and then deleted their alt account that was in santa
Well don't you worry about production value with my game. racicCursed
I've learned for jams and collabs to have my main plan.. and then come up with ways to chop that main plan down into smaller plans. And depending on time crunch, go with appropriate plan.
Really? I think a lot of people make weird goofy shit like me, but I appreciate (ha) the kind words bahd

this year, I really wasn't confident if I was even going to be able to submit anything for my original idea, so I had an idea for a simple randrandrand-like I could make in less than a day if the original idea were to fall apart

Skeleton collab. Wanna make a game but not really make a game? Skeleton collab.
it's literally like a wall of art that people just add their own drawing towards with no real goal or anything. The skeleton collab is just a project that people add towards with no real goal

@Poi_Moi this is where you just look at a different channel lmao
it was in the offtopic channel, which is like the only channel I used
i use the block function in the IWM discord with some frequency
it happened so much thaty's why I decided to leave. I'm sorry but lkike again there's a huge influx of children I don't get it
I have only ever blocked a single person on Discord lol
I've started my blocking arc so maybe I might rejoin but like I'm just not passionate about fangames anymore, I literally had all fangame related channels blocked by that point
i usually only block people who REALLY bother me, I still usually try to be cordial with people I may not necessarily like
@Neonomi its a long story and very personal, i was very close to them, but long story short they were a really manipulative pathological liar
I've recently just started blocking anyone I just don't deem as contributing anything useful to conversations and shit, people I don't like or just don't wanna read messages of
which game is this? looks peak

oh i had no chance but to cut ties lol
I genuinely feel bad for the people who have to deal with me lmfao
I wouldn't deem myself as evil but like I'm very mean and I have to be nicer
@Poi_Moi yeah you are definitely way too abrasive over things that do not deserve it
I am very mean, and as plasma says, abrasive over things that don't deserve, but most the time I end up not meaning what I say, which I have stated multiple times.
when i act mean it's always for the greater good. am i sociopath?
I don't really have like an emotional attachment to people, so I end up not caring about what I say about them and I say things that I shouldn't say, which I need to fix up
@Neonomi those things have nothing to do with each other

I'm a strange case. I really really don't care about half the shit I complain about. I really don't get upset by the stuff people say, it doesn't really piss me off, but I act like all of this is not the case for literally no reason and I just cannot explain why
@Neonomi if you get emotionally attached to the wellbeing of others, have the capability to feel sad etc, you are probably not a sociopath
Like obviously I'll get very passionate about something, but then like an hour later I'll sit around and think "Eh, it's whatever, I made a big deal for no reason"
it's like there's two of me in my own brain and one is chill and the other is well, me.

@Poi_Moi i had some stuff like that where i was trying to fit in with classmates in middle school and being mean got you integrated into the group more, i never was really in that group but i was still trying to fit in and i carried some of those habits for years until I identified and corrected them
i wouldnt call it joining the dark side, i was very much the bullied
Ngl being mean to try fitting in ended up describing my first 3 years in fangames unfortunately

well in my case, being mean gets my nothing, I just do it for no reason. I really wouldn't consider myself as having a big ego or anything, I dont put myself on a pedestal, I just act like I have an ass hole
So much of our problems in life are caused by us being unable to get over our own bullshit
every decent needle player: I'm bad
every bad needle player: "I'm better than this wtf"
yeah when you get bullied as a kid and being nice doesn't make it stop at all child you is gonna come up with bad solutions to try and stop that
self-perceived underperformance is what triggers me
I actually didn't get bullied much in school because my mother was very aggressive towards the school board, making sure things fucking stopped
so that was great at least
but then when you grow up and transition into social circles that are actually empathetic and good you can notice that actually those kinds of remarks just make people around you think less of you
@Poi_Moi bullying was such a huge problem in my school
and the teachers we had were way too lazy to do anything about it
hey sometimes people get cold feet

Yeah, ill admit i was kinda an asshole as a kid and overtime i lost a lot of friends (tbf a good few were probably from just growing apart but still) and it kinda hit me hard, so i started chilling tf out
where I reach out to someone and they respond and I canâ€™t follow up out of fear

The teachers at my school were lazy too, but like again, my mom was so fucking aggressive to the point of threatening lawsuits and because she was friends  with a lot of lawyers, the school was actually scared of her
so I was lucky with that
Oh I was bullied a lot consistently but I also probably did some mean things and bullied people back
they cracked down big time on bullying thanks to her
the type of stuff that happened at my school is the kinda stuff that would make the news if it came out
like its so bad i feel like mentioning it in twitch chat isnt appropriate
that'll be 100 bucks for the therapy session
